docs.text:
Roid Macros


Vanilla macros on steroids!




Overview


Roid Macros is aimed to provide TBC like macros (including conditionals!)
while abusing Vanilla WoW's Lua API to go even further including things
like executing macros from within macros! 


Further Information




Chat Commands
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
Roid Macros is aimed to provide TBC like macros (including conditionals!)
while abusing Vanilla WoW's Lua API to go even further including things
like executing macros from within macros!
docs.title: Overview

docs.text:
/petattack


/petattack
 makes your pet attack.


Examples


/petattack [@focus]




You pet will attack your focus target (if you have the Addon ClassicFocus or FocusFrame installed).




/petattack [@mouseover harm nodead]




Your pet will attack your mouseover target if it is attackable and not dead.
docs.title: /petattack

docs.text: /petattack [@focus]  You pet will attack your focus target (if you have the Addon ClassicFocus or FocusFrame installed).   /petattack [@mouseover harm nodead]  Your pet will attack your mouseover target if it is attackable and not dead.
docs.title: Examples

docs.text:
/rl


/rl
 tells the client to reload all Addons. This is mainly used for debugging.
docs.title: /rl

docs.text: /rl  tells the client to reload all Addons. This is mainly used for debugging.
